summary:
Commercially minded and analytical, with the ability to quickly process facts and complex issues and distil them into easily understood concepts. Good presentation and interpersonal skills. Desire to learn with a curious, open mind. Honest and straightforward. Empathetic, mature and self-confident leadership style.

Project Management & Business Development:
• Member of IKEA ”Agile Coach” network.
• Experience of managing an “Agile/Test & Learn” style project - Marketing & Loyalty, CRM.
• Variety of CRM, marketing, sales and product management experience - B2B and B2C on both agency and client side.

Leadership experience & Team Management:
• Experience in managing and developing people - both direct and indirect reports.
• Strong influencing skills.
• Experience of managing culturally diverse and geographically dispersed teams.
• Experience of managing sub-contractors/outsourced service providers. 

Business knowledge & Specialities:
• Marketing automation tools and processes.
• Retail – Home Furnishing, Automotive and DIY.
• Production and localisation of multi-lingual digital training materials.
• Engagement and influencing of sales channels and franchise networks.

profile_positions.description:
• Oversight of IKEA Business Solutions (IBS) roll out of both IKEA Customer Analytics (ICA) and IKEA Multichannel Campaign Platform (IMCP) to the Indian loyalty team, to facilitate “in-house” customer data analysis and support the planning, creation and execution of automated, personalised marketing communications across email, mobile and social.
• Liaison between Indian loyalty team, IBS and CRM Programme to ensure that promised Marketing and Loyalty deliverables (across data, solutions, ways of working and training) are delivered to the Indian market.   
• Oversight of implementation of global IKEA Work Force Management (WFM) solution at the Customer Support Centre (CSC) in India, to enable swift and efficient staff planning to cope with increased sales (and associated contact volumes) resulting from the launch of ecommerce in India.
• Oversight of implementation (and expansion) of Cisco contact management solution at the CSC in India, to enable high volumes of (legally compliant) communication with Indian customers via voice, email, web chat and social.
profile_positions.title: Global Lead (Customer Experience Stream, EIGB Programme)

profile_positions.description:
• Purchase and initial roll out of IKEA Customer Analytics (ICA) solution (and training) to numerous markets: Sweden, Germany, Netherlands and Australia.
• Development of Customer Analytics insights, algorithms and models to drive both triggered and pushed customer communications, leading to reduced churn and increased sales. 
• Development, pilot and roll out of IKEA Multichannel Campaign Platform (IMCP) to support markets in the planning, creation and execution of automated, personalised marketing communications across email and mobile. 
• Development and roll out of frameworks, processes and tools to help markets to take data driven/insight led decisions, leading to relevant, personalised customer communications that drive increased engagement and activation.
• Working with 4 key partner markets (Germany, Spain, Sweden and US) to develop and package proven CRM solutions that deliver tangible incremental revenue.
• Management of a diverse project team of circa 25 people, comprising a mixture of external consultants, experienced IKEA employees, technical specialists and new recruits: to not only deliver CRM solutions for IKEA, but also develop future IKEA CRM leaders.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager (Marketing & Loyalty Project, CRM Programme)

profile_positions.description: • Working with children (aged 8 to 18) across a variety of nationalities, backgrounds and experience, to develop the confidence, skills, stamina and strength to swim competitively at all levels: from internal school/club to regional and national competition standard.
profile_positions.title: Swim Coach

profile_positions.description:
• Delivery of a revolutionary hybrid app for Samsung UK to enable usage of flagship mobile handsets and smartwatches loaned to channel sales staff to be monitored for subsequent provision of feedback and education
• Oversight of international organic growth of key automotive and agricultural clients (AGCO and Fiat groups)
• Planning and leadership of pitches to Ford of Britain: definition of required infrastructure, systems and processes; construction of finance models; group-wide team coordination
• Performance Improvement (training and incentivisation of channel sales staff)
• Group liaison to increase intra-agency communication and cooperation: facilitate client sharing to increase provision of services and group revenue; share and maximize new business opportunities
• Indirect oversight/management of group digital agency (Aqua Eye) to ensure profitable (on time and budget) delivery of all digital projects for Neon and Neon clients: increased project management resource to enable better segregation of roles/responsibilities and ensure more efficient project delivery; Implemented intra-agency and agency/client working practices to better manage client expectations, tighten product/project specifications, minimise project creep and maximise profitability of change control requests
profile_positions.title: Client Service Director

profile_positions.description:
• Development and roll-out of pan-European digital projects for Ford of Europe: 3 mobile apps and 6 eLearning courses
• Collaboration with the Ford of Britain account team to deliver/launch their new/next generation incentive platform via Sigmer
• Efficiency and effectiveness of eLearning and Performance Improvement people, processes and systems
• Strategic appointment of specialist staff (full-time and freelance) in order to implement current and future projects with maximum profitability and minimal knowledge drain
• Implementation of rigorous processes (both internal and with external stakeholders) to ensure efficient and timely delivery of numerous complex multi-lingual programmes across Europe
• Leadership of a project to investigate and define the agency strategy for use of Rapid Development Tools to maximise internal efficiencies and enable the agency to keep at the forefront of industry developments
profile_positions.title: Head of Delivery (E-Learning & Performance Improvement)

profile_positions.description:
• Delivery of a raft of functionality upgrades and bug fixes to existing complex legacy systems for Ford of Britain, Coca-Cola GB and Volvo
• Management of a discrete digital team of developers (Microsoft .NET & SQL) and technical specialists
• Recommendation and management of the migration of the Skybridge digital team into Euro RSCG People Digital, to facilitate knowledge share and enable better resource planning
• Recruitment to fill a number of key skills gaps: Flash eLearning/app developers; senior .NET developer; digital project manager
• Selection of and negotiation with an outsourced technology partner (Sigmer) to provide next generation incentive management systems to replace existing legacy systems for key clients
profile_positions.title: Head of Electronic Business Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Euro RSCG Skybridge (Ford of Europe/new business):
• Development and delivery of dealer facing (local language) digital training materials (eLearning and apps) to support the phased launch of 7 new commercial vehicles across 21 European markets
• Management of the initial build of a pan-European (25 language) online sales incentive platform across car and commercial vehicle dealership sales staff (circa 14k participants)
• Set-up and management of the relationships with key suppliers for provision of pan-European rewards: Amazon e-vouchers; CITI Visa open-loop reward cards
• Market attractiveness and competitor positioning research to identify pan-European opportunities in the Tech/Telco sector

BMT VCCP (Toyota GB):
• Definition of the infrastructure, systems and processes required for BMT to service the Toyota UK dealer marketing account

Doner Cardwell Hawkins (Lancia Europe):
• Strategic advice on a proposed re-introduction of the Lancia brand into the UK market

Deeks Consulting (Standard Life):
• Analysis of the global requirements for a dynamic asset management solution for personalisation, production, distribution, archiving and monitoring of all corporate communications (internal and external)

Semaphore Partnership (B&Q China):
• Responsible for the phased roll out of an asset management solution for personalisation and production of in-store marketing collateral
profile_positions.title: Marketing Resource Management (MRM) Consultant, Freelance

profile_positions.description:
• Partnerships with key clients (DeBeers, British Telecom, Chrysler Jeep, Royal Mail, Royal Dutch Shell), to deliver solutions to their customer base 
• Business development - proactive anticipation of clients’ future requirements and associated product development
• Thought leadership in category to position/differentiate Marketing Technologies
profile_positions.title: Client Service Director & business co-owner

profile_positions.description:
• Development and delivery of best of breed client solutions within the emerging Marketing Resource Management (MRM) sector
• Management of a complex/demanding team of developers to build market leading solutions
• Partnerships/relationships with key industry players (e.g. Accenture, Gartner etc.) to position AdTool as a dynamic new entrant in the MRM sector
profile_positions.title: Operations Director & business co-owner

company.name: boymeetsgirl, The Reef, Marketing Drive (IPG Marketing Communications Agencies)

profile_positions.company: boymeetsgirl, The Reef, Marketing Drive (IPG Marketing Communications Agencies)
profile_positions.description:
• Management and implementation of integrated marketing campaigns involving online, print, outdoor, radio, TV, cinema, DM (physical and e-dm), print and production, events, promotions and POS
• Account management of key retail accounts - Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment and Chrysler Jeep
profile_positions.title: Account Management

company.name: ICI Paints (Dulux, Polycell, Glidden, ICI Autocolor)

profile_positions.description:
• Business to business product management in the international marketing department of ICI Autocolor
• Consumer product management and category management for Dulux, Glidden and Polycell brands
• Project management (and EPOS sales data analysis) of key retail clients B&Q, Homebase, Focus and Wilkinsons
profile_positions.title: Customer Marketing & Product Management
